A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I think this movie was Epic!  My family loved it.  I think those that dislike it are just plain wrong.  I enjoyed the humor.  I enjoyed the special effects.  I didn't mind the length of the film (the more Star Wars\, the better).  I loved the surprises.  If you enjoyed the original trilogy and Force Awakens\, then I think you will enjoy this film.
